item.title: Focusing on open source monitoring. Joining raintank.
item.description: Vimeo is special. It changed my life. But interests, goals and ambitions change. This post is about leaving, joining raintank, working remote while traveling, open source monitoring, startups, personal relations, litmus and Grafana alerting
